para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="triangle_schema.xsd" targetNamespace="http://www.zorba-xquery.com/schema/test/triangle_schema" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xs:simpleType name="triangle"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Right"/> <xs:enumeration value="Equilateral"/> <xs:enumeration value="Isosceles"/> <xs:enumeration value="Scalene"/> <xs:enumeration value="Obtuse"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
